show_name: Tsuujou Kougeki ga Zentai Kougeki de Ni-kai Kougeki no Okaasan wa Suki Desu ka?
other_title: Do You Like Your Mom? Her Normal Attack is Two Attacks at Full Power
Do You Love Your Mom and Her Two-Hit Multi-Target Attacks?
通常攻撃が全体攻撃で二回攻撃のお母さんは好きですか？
opening_theme: "Iyayo Iyayo mo Suki no Uchi (イヤヨイヤヨモスキノウチ！)" by Spira Spica (スピラ・スピカ)
ending_theme: "Tsuujou Kougeki ga Zentai Kougeki de Ni-kai Kougeki Mama (通常攻撃が全体攻撃で二回攻撃ママ)" by Mamako Oosuki (Ai Kayano)
